About Events Organizers

Learn from each others’ failures and gain knowledge - peer to peer

Topics include Lean Startup, Design Thinking, Agile & Business Development

About Leancamp

Leancamp is an open conference where you set the topics. You’ll meet people engaged in startups, corporations and a range of related fields — all sharing their experience in the name of progressing the state of the art.

Learn what happens at a Leancamp

Join a Leancamp nearby!

Leancamp runs from London, to San Fransisco, to Sofia, to Bangalore. More than 15 cities around the world!

Find out about upcoming Leancamps

Your city is not listed? Are you interested in doing a Leancamp in your city?
